com.intel.bigdatamem

Class ByteBufferSerializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intel.bigdatamem.ByteBufferSerializer

  • public class ByteBufferSerializer
extends Object
    a serializer class that manages to serialize any serilizable objects from/to ByteBuffer.

      • toMemBufferHolder

        public static <A extends CommonAllocator<A>,ValueT> MemBufferHolder<A> toMemBufferHolder(A ar,
                                                                                         ValueT obj)
                                                                                  throws IOException
        serialize object to a MemBufferHolder object.
        Type Parameters:
        A - the type of bound allocator
        ValueT - the type of object
        Parameters:
        ar - specify an Allocator that is used to generate MemBufferHolder which is backed by a native memory block
        obj - specify a object that is serializable
        Returns:
        a MemBufferHolder object contained serialized object
        Throws:
        IOException - the exception of serialization

                                                                               ClassNotFoundException
        de-serialize an object from a MemBufferHolder object.
        Type Parameters:

        ValueT - the type of object
        Parameters:
        mbh - specify an MemBufferHolder who contains data that can be de-serialized
        Returns:
        a de-serialized object
        Throws:
        IOException - the exception of deserialization
